Reviews.Title: canon t3
Reviews.Author: suegirl1973
Reviews.Content: Camera takes amazing pictures and videos, very easy to operate, Lens are very easy with the IS built in. Great camera

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS kit
Reviews.Author: Mir
Reviews.Content: A nice kit for Canon Rebel T3 same as described, well protected, with good support from seller and a fast delivery: excellent!!!

Reviews.Title: My 1st digital SLR
Reviews.Author: Jude
Reviews.Content: I had a film SLR camera and loved it.  I bought a point and shoot digital and although it was nice it wasn't an SLR.  This camera exceeded my expectations and I couldn't be happier with it.  I only wish I had ordered one sooner.

Reviews.Title: camera SLR T3
Reviews.Author: barbi Schmuhl "Barbi"
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Great price. All the pieces fit in the canon back pack 200EG perfectly. Highly recommend this camera for amatures.

<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
